nodes.text: Golden Opportunity was a freighter that was operated by the company Skydove Freight during the era of the New Republic, and it was flown by the Quarren pilot Pocka.

Golden Opportunity was created by Jeff Grubb and Owen K.C. Stevens, and it featured in the 2002 role-playing adventure Tempest Feud. In Tempest Feud, it was possible for Pocka to transport the player characters aboard Golden Opportunity to the moon Nar Shaddaa, so that they could attend a party in the penthouse of the Hutt Popara, if the players lacked a starship of their own. However, the 2012 novel Scourge established the canon series of events from the Tempest Feud storyline and established that the Jedi archivist Mander Zuma and the spacers Reen Irana and Eddey Be'ray—who fulfill the role of the Tempest Feud player characters—traveled to Nar Shaddaa on the freighter New Ambition, thus rendering Pocka's transportation of the player characters aboard Golden Opportunity non-canon.
